preparation.raw_text:
1. In a fume hood, measure 6.00 g of Arsenic Trioxide using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 24.00 g of Lead Oxide with the same balance. 
 3. Measure 8.00 g of Thallium(III) Oxide. 
 4. Combine all the measured powders in a clean, dry glass beaker. 
 5. Stir the mixture thoroughly using a glass rod until a uniform blend is achieved.
